import React, { useState } from 'react'; import classes from './addressForm.module.css'; function AddressForm(props){ const [mob, setMob] = useState(" "); function addressSave(event){ event.preventDefault(); } function mobHandler(event){ const no = event.target.value; setMob(no); } return(

CONTACT DETAILS

onChange = {mobHandler}

ADDRESS

); } export default AddressForm;
